Package tim.pacman

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    GameControls
    The game controls, handling setting the velocity and direction of each player.
    GameMode
    A game mode which handles all mode-related logic, such as ghosts, ending the game, collision detection and scoring.
    GhostController
    An interface that controls a ghost rather than a regular player.
    Gui
    A GUI for the application, such as the menu screen.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractGameControls
    A basic implementation of game controls, allows easy access to setting the player location with matching velocity and rotation.
    AbstractGameMode
    A basic implementation of a game mode, handles basic user interfacing for displaying the players score, time remaining, and the lead player.
    GameMap
    The game map, with a static array of the default map.
    Ghost
    A ghost, which is implemented such that the AStar algorithm is extremely easy.
    PacmanApplication
    The entry point for the pac man plus, a pacman clone with a few more features.
    Player
